Sentence.sentence: A few years later, a large defense buildup finally provided a fiscal stimulus adequate to the economy's needs—and suddenly industry was eager to employ those unadaptable and untrained workers.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Oh, yesterday I finally got around to that new barbershop in the mall and enjoyed their services.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I guess all those hours of practice in the past month are finally paying off.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I went there last Saturday for their grand opening sale, but I drove around the parking lot for nearly an hour, looking for a space before I finally gave up and came home
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I finally found a really nice apartment that's within my price range
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: What does Sanjay Kumar ask the woman to do finally?
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: A few years later, a large defense buildup finally provided a fiscal stimulus adequate to the economy's needs—and suddenly industry was eager to employ those "unadaptable and untrained" workers.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: And surely we will aim to finally eradicate disease and poverty.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: As stories go through the chains of people, they are refined, corrected and sorted out until they come finally to me and I have a chance to read through most stories before I go on the air.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: As the plant dries, these resources take on first the properties of honey, then rubber, and finally enter a glass-like state that is the most stable state that the plant can maintain, Farrant says.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: But then when you see a picture, the idea finally clicks?
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: finally, attitudes have a behavioral component.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: The more people are on their phones, the fewer people are talking until finally you're the only one left not reading email or checking Twitter.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些词或词组均含有"最后，终于"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: at last, at length, eventually, finally, in the end, lastly
means: at last ：多指经主观努力，克服各种困难后才终于达到目的。
at length ：强调经历一段长时间后终于完成，侧重在时间部分。
eventually ：侧重于动作或行为的结果。
finally ：常与at last换用，都可用于对往事的描述，但finally不带感情色彩，指一系列事情的最后结局。
in the end与at last同义，但in the end不仅可指"过去"还可表示对"未来"的预计。
lastly ：指连续顺序的最后，通常用在列举事情的场合。

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地
economical节约的,经济的+ly……地→adv.经济地,经济学地
exact强求,精确的+ly……地→adv.正确地,严密地
exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地
financial财政的,金融的+ly……地→adv.财政上,金融上
formal正式的;形式的+ly……地→adv.正式地,形式上
fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地
general总的,大体的+ly……地→adv.一般,通常,一般地
glorious光荣的,显赫的+ly……地→adv.光荣地,辉煌地
great大的+ly……地→adv.大大地,非常
immediate立即的+ly……地→adv.立即,马上,直接地
incidental附带的+ly……地→adv.附带地,顺便提及
increasing渐增的+ly……地→adv.日益,愈加
instant立即的;紧迫的+ly……地→adv.立即地,即刻地
like像+ly……地→有些像的→很可能
logical逻辑的,符合逻辑的+ly……地→adv.论理上,逻辑上
mental精神的+ly……地→adv.精神上,智力上,在内心
moderate中等的,适度的+ly……地→adv.适度地

progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

unfortunate不幸的+ly……地→adv.不幸地
uniform贯的,一致的+ly……地→adv.一律地,均一地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊

Sentence.sentence: After years of regular treatment, she finally became healthy.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Afterwards, she and her father secured their first business meeting with a supermarket owner, who finally agreed to sell Moore's product—cancandy.

Sentence.sentence: Finally, I'd like to remind you that there will be several parent's evenings during this term.

Sentence.sentence: Finally, let's see, who is on duty today.

Sentence.sentence: Finally, we faced the number one team in the state.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷2 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Finally, you never know what wonderful idea might strike while your mind has moved slowly away.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Her years of hard work have finally been acknowledged after a customer nominated her to be cheshire's woman of the year.

Sentence.sentence: How did the author finally get this TV set working again?
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读A 题设

Sentence.sentence: I finally quit delivering newspapers and didn't see mrs.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（11月） 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: If you talk about fashion today, you are talking about China - its influences, its direction, its breathtaking clothes, and how young designers and models are finally acknowledging that in many ways.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Mary was silent during the early part of the discussion but finally she gave voice to her opinion on the subject.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: On a summer evening in beijing in 2008, all those long, hard hours of work and commitment finally bore fruit.

Sentence.sentence: She practiced hard and finally made it.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: The lives of these people have finally been recorded thanks to the effects of a Frenchman form Paris called gin.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Though pages were turned slowly, I got the main idea of the story about a dog who, like mine, had been separated from his family and who finally found his way back home.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: We are finally waking up to the severity of the problem by supporting and developing a group of tools, apps and approaches intended to prevent scammers from getting through.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: We finally did and it was love at first sight.

Sentence.sentence: When the bus finally came, we all hurried on board.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷2 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: When we were finally safe on the other side, he said to me, "you know, I didn't tell you this during the season, but you did fine."

Sentence.sentence: He finally took that post at a major financial institution three years later.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Within the complex social structure of the scientific community, researchers make discoveries; editors and reviewers act as gatekeepers by controlling the publication process; other scientists use the new finding to suit their own purposes; and finally, the public ( ' , including other scientists) receives the new discovery and possibly accompanying technology.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Now comes word that everyone involved---Democrats, Republicans, the Postal Service, the unions and the system's heaviest users --as finally agreed on a plan to fix the system.
Sentence.come: 出自-2018年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Finally,because automation threatens to widen the gap between capital income and labor income, taxes and the safety net will have to be rethought.

Sentence.sentence: finally, assuming you're lost in an area humans tend to frequent, look for the mark we leave on the landscape.
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: finally, because automation threatens to widen the gap between capital income and labor income, taxes and the safety net will have to be rethought.
Sentence.come: 2018年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: finally, figures close to the France government have murmured, euro-zone members should agree to some fiscal and social harmonization: e.g., curbing competition in corporate-tax rates or labour costs.
Sentence.come: 2011年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Now comes word that everyone involved—Democrats, Republicans, the Postal Service, the unions and the system's heaviest users—has finally agreed on a plan to fix the system.
Sentence.come: 2018年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Too often we believe that, a new job, bigger house or better car will be the magic silver bullet that will allow us to finally be content, but the reality is these things have little lasting impact on our happiness levels.
Sentence.come: 2016年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: We still have a long way to go to get back to full employment, but at least we are now finally moving forward at a faster pace.
Sentence.come: 2015年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: within the complex social structure of the scientific community, researchers make discoveries; editors and reviewers act as gatekeepers by controlling the publication process; other scientists use the new finding to suit their own purposes; and finally, t
Sentence.come: 2012年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

means.word_mean: 最后, 终于; 完全地

sentences.en: It's not finally settled yet.
sentences.cn: 这事还没有最后解决。

fixed_phrase_list.en: 2.Finally, I wold like to thank you all for coming here today.
fixed_phrase_list.cn: 最后，我感谢大家今天的光临。

sentence.cn: 加尔萨最终终于同意了。
sentence.from: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

entry.def: You use finally to suggest that something happens after a long period of time, usually later than you wanted or expected it to happen.

example.ex: The word was finally given for us to get on board...
The food finally arrived at the end of last week and distribution began...
example.tran: 食品总算在上周末运到并开始分发。

entry.def: You use finally to indicate that something is last in a series of actions or events.

example.ex: The action slips from comedy to melodrama and finally to tragedy.
example.tran: 剧情从喜剧逐渐发展为情节剧，最后又演变为悲剧。

entry.def: You use finally in speech or writing to introduce a final point, question, or topic.
entry.tran: (用于引出观点等)最后，最后要说的是

example.tran: 最后要说的是，谁还需要剧院呢？

example.ex: And finally, a word about the winner and runner-up.

means.word_mean: 1. after a long period of time or an especially long delay;
3. as the end result of a succession or process;

sentences.sentence: "at long last the winter was over"

sentences.cn: 晚了半小时以后演出终于开始了。
sentences.en: The performance finally started half an hour late.

sentences.cn: 我终于设法引起了她的注意。
sentences.en: I finally managed to get her attention.

sentences.cn: 他们最后到达时已是第二天的凌晨。
sentences.en: When they finally arrived it was well past midnight.

sentences.cn: 最后，我感谢大家今天的光临。
sentences.en: And finally, I would like to thank you all for coming here today.

sentences.cn: 这事后来才得到彻底解决。
sentences.en: The matter was not finally settled until later.

sentences.cn: 终于通知我们登乘了。
sentences.en: The word was finally given for us to get on board...

sentences.cn: 食品总算在上周末运到并开始分发。
sentences.en: The food finally arrived at the end of last week and distribution began...

sentences.cn: 剧情从喜剧逐渐发展为情节剧，最后又演变为悲剧。
sentences.en: The action slips from comedy to melodrama and finally to tragedy.

sentences.cn: 最后要说的是，谁还需要剧院呢？
sentences.en: Finally, who needs the theatre?...

sentences.cn: 最后，来谈一谈冠亚军。
sentences.en: And finally, a word about the winner and runner-up.

sentences.cn: 介绍一个很好的尺度空间理论的完整的源代码, 已经过测试.
sentences.en: An good introduction on Scale space theory complete source code, has been tested.

sentences.cn: 在多年不和之后,他们终于言归于好了.
sentences.en: They finally came together after years of estrangement.

sentences.cn: 父母最终同意女儿同那位年轻人结婚.
sentences.en: The parents finally agreed to pair their daughter with that young man.

sentences.cn: 他最后批准了我的计划.
sentences.en: He finally OK'd my plan.

sentences.cn: 他最终承认了失败.
sentences.en: He finally conceded defeat.

sentences.cn: 他最终犹犹豫豫地接受了.
sentences.en: He finally accepted hesitantly.

sentences.cn: 通过三年的努力,他最终克服了听觉中的困难.
sentences.en: Finally he overcame the auditory difficulties by three years'efforts.

sentences.cn: 这个强大的帝国最终瓦解了.
sentences.en: The mighty empire finally crumbled.

sentences.cn: 徒步走了一整天,我们终于爬到了山顶.
sentences.en: After hiking all day we finally reached the uppermost part of the mountain.

sentences.cn: 问题算解决了.
sentences.en: The problem is finally solved.

sentences.cn: 经过长时间的盘问之后,她终于承认了.
sentences.en: After prolonged questioning she finally confessed.

sentences.cn: 经过抢救,病人终于脱险.
sentences.en: The patient was finally out of danger after the emergency treatment.

sentences.cn: 尽管勉强，他最后还是同意帮助我们。
sentences.en: He finally agreed, albeit reluctantly, to help us.

sentences.cn: 她开始表示反对，但最终还是同意了。
sentences.en: At first she demurred, but then finally agreed.

sentences.cn: 警察最终制伏了持枪歹徒。
sentences.en: Police finally managed to overpower the gunman.

sentences.cn: 他们最后到达时已是第二天的凌晨。
sentences.en: When they finally arrived it was well past midnight.

sentences.cn: 最后，我感谢大家今天的光临。
sentences.en: And finally, I would like to thank you all for coming here today.

sentences.cn: 剧情从喜剧逐渐发展为情节剧，最后又演变为悲剧。
sentences.en: The action slips from comedy to melodrama and finally to tragedy.

sentences.cn: 最后要说的是，谁还需要剧院呢？
sentences.en: Finally, who needs the theatre?...

sentences.cn: 最后，来谈一谈冠亚军。
sentences.en: And finally, a word about the winner and runner-up.

sentences.cn: 最后，由于自动化可能会进一步扩大资本收益与劳动收益之间的差距，所以必须重新考虑税收和保障措施。
sentences.en: Finally, because automation threatens to widen the gap between capital income and labor taxes and the net will have to be rethought.

sentences.cn: 最后，行为也是态度的一个成分。
sentences.en: Finally, attitudes have a behavioral component.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 还有最后一题，在西班牙，一些公司保持这样的工作模式：员工先工作至大约下午2点，然后下午5点半返回办公室，工作至晚上八九点或10点。
sentences.en: And finally, in Spain, some businesses maintain the pattern of working until about 2 o’clock and then returning to the office from 5:30 to 8:00, 9:00, or 10:00 in the evening
sentences.from: 18年6月六级真题(第一套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 最后，大体上达成一些一致意见。
sentences.en: And finally, reach some agreement in principle
sentences.from: 17年12月四级真题(第二套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 最后, 以轮式装载机为例,验证了各模型在产品通用平台辨识应用中的有效性.
sentences.en: Finally, a case of wheel loader was provided to demonstrate the effectiveness of above studies.

sentences.cn: 为什么可奈最后同意跟寇儿一块儿去了?
sentences.en: Why did Kenai finally agree to go with Koda?
